message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price, considering the value you'll get from the product.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you being flexible. While I'm interested in the product, $12,000 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $10,500? I believe this price is fair considering my needs and the value you've placed on the product.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value I've placed on the product.
